Package com.rubynaxela.kyanite.core.audio

Class Music

java.lang.Object
org.jsfml.internal.SFMLNativeObject
org.jsfml.audio.SoundSource
com.rubynaxela.kyanite.core.audio.SoundSource
org.jsfml.audio.SoundStream
com.rubynaxela.kyanite.core.audio.SoundStream
org.jsfml.audio.Music
com.rubynaxela.kyanite.core.audio.Music
public class Music extends Music
Provides functionality to play music streams from common audio file formats. Audio files can be opened using either the openFromFile(Path) or openFromStream(InputStream) methods. The supported audio file formats are: ogg, wav, flac, aiff, au, raw, paf, svx, nist, voc, ircam, w64, mat4, mat5 pvf, htk, sds, avr, sd2, caf, wve, mpc2k, rf64.

    • initialize

      protected final void initialize(int channelCount, int sampleRate)
      Description copied from class: SoundStream
      Defines the audio stream parameters. Before the stream can be played, the implementing class must call this method.
      Overrides:
      initialize in class SoundStream
      Parameters:
      channelCount - the amount of audio channels (e.g. 1 for mono, 2 for stereo)
      sampleRate - the sample rate in samples per second
